column4: Okay, everyone who was just helping me: Turns out we were trying to install the wrong driver, as she has a different camera than we thought. This one is supposed to work out of the box, and she's going to reboot her computer (she updated it earlier without rebooting).
And it turns out we had it wrong xD
yeah, if it works in cheese at all, then you have the driver
why did you do sudo make?
no, it is just make.  Have you tried gstreamer-properties?
Okay. What am I going to have her change?
just try to get it working, it should make sense

She says that when she clicks Test to test her video output, without changing settings, the cam works fine in that little window that pops up. But it doesn't work in Cheese. I guess the cam itself is fine?
have her try changing some settings in cheese, or maybe use a different app
Yep, that's exactly what we're trying now... thank you very much :)
maybe this build will work? https://launchpad.net/~audacity-team/+archive/daily          that isn't stable btw
